Regarding this point, my current opinion differs slightly from what I argued in the foreword to Naishtat’s book; see Francisco Naishtat, Problemas filosóficos en la acción individual y colectiva: Una perspectiva pragmática (Buenos Aires: Prometeo, 2005), 17. This change of opinion does not, of course, imply a critique of Naishtat’s rigorous work.
